topic.title: ACCESSIBLE INFORMATION CONTACT METHOD CODE (SNOMED CT)
topic.shortdesc: ACCESSIBLE INFORMATION CONTACT METHOD CODE (SNOMED CT) is the SNOMED CT® concept ID which is used to identify that the PATIENT requires a different or specific contact method.
